member.name: T:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.DataCalendar
member.summary:
Code sample by Mike Ellison from article http://www.codeproject.com/aspnet/MellDataCalendar.asp
subclass of the ASP.NET Calendar control for displaying events from a DataTable with support for templates
Mike has given permission to use this as we will with no conditions though he does appreciate any reference to him in the credits or code
Last Modified: 2008-01-28

devdoc.para: Gets the date represented by an instance of this class. This property is read-only.
Gets the string equivilent of the date represented by an instance of this class. This property is read-only.
Gets a value indicating whether the date represented by an instance of this class is in a different month from the month currently being displayed. This property is read-only.
Gets a value indicating whether the date represented by an instance of this class is today's date. This property is read-only.
Gets a value indicating whether the date represented by an instance of this class is on a weekend day. This property is read-only.

member.name: T:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.FlexibleGridView
member.summary:
Based on a custom GridView by Matt Berseth: http://mattberseth.com/blog/2007/07/how_to_show_header_and_footer.html
It allows header and footer to be shown even the there is no data in the GridView.

member.summary: Extracts and caches the metadata for an image.

member.name: M:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.FolderGallery.ImageInfo.GetImageDate(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Gets and caches the most relevant date available for an image. It looks first at the EXIF date, then at the creation date from ITPC data, and then at the file's creation date if everything else failed.

member.name: T:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.google.LocationMap
member.summary:
This a control for displaying a google map based on the location set in the location property. This is more simple than using latitude longitude, lat and long are derived automatically if possible from the location. Alternatively you can set the coordinates.
TODO: implement more of the optional features like overlays etc

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.google.LocationMap.DirectionsButtonText
member.summary: gets or sets the text on the button used for requesting directions

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.google.LocationMap.DirectionsButtonToolTip
member.summary: gets or sets the tooltip text on the button used for requesting directions

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.google.LocationMap.EnableMapType
member.summary: if true the options for satelite and hybrid maps are vailable

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.google.LocationMap.EnableZoom
member.summary: if true uses the ma control with zoom tool

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.google.LocationMap.ShowInfoWindow
member.summary: if true shows a ballon with the location info

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.google.LocationMap.EnableLocalSearch
member.summary: if true shows a search input and searches google for things close to the location

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.google.LocationMap.EnableDrivingDirections
member.summary: if true shows an input and a button for entering a start address and requesting directions.

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.google.LocationMap.MapHeight
member.summary: pixel height of rendered map

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.google.LocationMap.MapWidth
member.summary: pixel width of rendered map

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.google.LocationMap.UseLatLong
member.summary: If set to true the map will be centered on the Latitude/Longitude coordinates.

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.google.LocationMap.Latitude
member.summary: If UseLatLong is true, the map will be centered using this Latitude.

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.google.LocationMap.Longitude
member.summary: If UseLatLong is true, the map will be centered using this Longitude.

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.google.LocationMap.Location
member.summary: If UseLatLong is false and this string has a value of a location that can be looked up, the map will display the found location.

member.summary: Sets up the javscript for this map instance to be created.

member.summary: Source: http://www.freshclickmedia.com/blog/2008/02/gravatar-aspnet-control/ 2008-08-13 added to this project and changed namespace to be more convenient 2008-08-13 added support for SSL by returning the secure url if request is secure

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.Gravatar.Email
member.summary: The Email for the user

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.Gravatar.Size
member.summary: Size of Gravatar image. Must be between 1 and 512.

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.Gravatar.MaxAllowedRating
member.summary: An optional "rating" parameter may follow with a value of [ G | PG | R | X ] that determines the highest rating (inclusive) that will be returned.

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.Gravatar.OutputGravatarSiteLink
member.summary: Determines whether the image is wrapped in an anchor tag linking to the Gravatar sit

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.Gravatar.LinkTitle
member.summary: Optional property for link title for gravatar website link

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.Gravatar.LinkUrl
member.summary: By default links to Gravatar so users can get a gravatar, but you can override it and link to a user profile for example

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.Gravatar.DefaultImage
member.summary: An optional "default" parameter may follow that specifies the full, URL encoded URL, protocol included, of a GIF, JPEG, or PNG image that should be returned if either the requested email address has no associated gravatar, or that gravatar has a rating higher than is allowed by the "rating" parameter.

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.Gravatar.GravatarBaseUrl
member.summary: Gets the base Url based on whether the request is secure or not. Added by 2008-08-13

member.name: T:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.mojoGridView
member.summary: The only purposeof this control is because we use the CSS Control Adapter to extend it rather thasn extend the standard GridView directly. This allows the standard GridView to work as expected for those who don't want to use the Adapter.

member.name: T:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.SeparatorControl
member.summary:
Created: 2006/04/20 Last Modified: 2007/04/20
The use and distribution terms for this software are covered by the Common Public License 1.0 (http://opensource.org/licenses/cpl.php) which can be found in the file CPL.TXT at the root of this distribution. By using this software in any fashion, you are agreeing to be bound by the terms of this license.
You must not remove this notice, or any other, from this software.
The purpose of this control is just for displaying a separator between links in the mojoportal skins either as text or image, with option to hide when authenticated or hide when anonymous.

member.name: T:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.AddThisButton
member.summary: See http://www.addthis.com

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.AddThisButton.AccountId
member.summary: Your addthis.com username. If this is not set the control will not render.

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.AddThisButton.UseMouseOverWidget
member.summary: if true will show widget in the page

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.AddThisButton.CustomLogoUrl
member.summary: The logo to display on the popup window (about 200x50 pixels). The popup window is show when the user selects the 'More' choice

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.AddThisButton.CustomLogoBackgroundColor
member.summary: The color to use as a background around the logo in the popup

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.AddThisButton.CustomLogoColor
member.summary: The color to use for the text next to the logo in the popup

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.AddThisButton.CustomBrand
member.summary: The brand name to display in the drop-down (top right)

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.AddThisButton.CustomOptions
member.summary: A comma-separated ordered list of options to include in the drop-down Example: addthis_options = 'favorites, email, digg, delicious, more'; Currently supported options: delicious, digg, email, favorites, facebook, fark, furl, google, live, myweb, myspace, newsvine, reddit, slashdot, stumbleupon, technorati, twitter, more (the default is currently 'favorites, digg, delicious, google, myspace, facebook, reddit, newsvine, live, more', in that order).

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.AddThisButton.CustomOffsetTop
member.summary: Vertical offset for the drop-down window widget (in pixels) thiscontrol defaults to -999 which means unsepcified this will result in the defaults from addthis.com not sure what the defsault is

member.name: P:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.AddThisButton.CustomOffsetLeft
member.summary: Horizontal offset for the drop-down window widget (in pixels) thiscontrol defaults to -999 which means unsepcified this will result in the defaults from addthis.com not sure what the defsault is

member.name: T:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.SmartCombo
member.summary:
Author: Created: 2005-08-20 Last Modified: 2008-09-03
Dependencies: must point the ScriptDirectory property at a folder containing SmartCombo.js as well as the Sarissa javascript files: sarissa.js and sarissa_ieemu_xpath.js which provide a javascript abstration layer around the different XmlHttpRequest features of the different web browsers. more info: http://sarissa.sourceforge.net/doc/

member.name: T:mojoPortal.Web.Controls.WatermarkTextBox
member.summary:
Based on article from CodeProject, with modifications by 7/3/2006
Source: http://www.codeproject.com/useritems/WatermarkTextBoxControl.asp?df=100
The WatermarkTextBox is a asp.net servercontrol that extends a default textbox by showing the "watermark" when no text is entered by the user. Typical watermark text can be " enter your text here " or " search terms " Copyright 2006, Wouter Steenbergen - We See Consultancy (www.wesee.nl)

member.summary: The text to show when no text is entered by the user.

member.summary: Gets or sets the script directory.

member.summary: Use the HTML5 placeholder attribute?

member.summary: Render this control to the output parameter specified.
member.param: The HTML writer to write out to
